item.title: Dynamics DNS with pfSense and Route53
item.description: The quite excellent pfSense comes with a dynamic DNS plugin for Amazon’s Route53 DNS management service. However, there is little to no documentation provided on how to set it up properly and especially about setting up the relevant IAM access policies. So I went to the pfSense repository on GitHub and browsed the code in order to find out how much access the plugin needed in order to do its deed.
